mapper.select: SELECT a.mat_no, a.mat_code, a.mat_name, a.mat_unit, a.mat_price, b.make_price FROM m_material a, m_make_mat_dept b WHERE a.mat_no=b.mat_no AND (a.mat_code LIKE CONCAT('_', #{q}, '%') OR a.mat_code LIKE CONCAT(#{q}, '%') OR a.mat_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q}, '%')) AND b.make_dept=#{userTeam}

SELECT a.bill_no, a.team_no, a.mat_amount, a.occ_date, a.remark, a.modi_date, a.check_step, ap.process_name check_step_name, b.mat_code, b.mat_name, b.mat_unit, b.mat_price, c.user_name modi_emp_name, d.store_name, o.text team_name FROM m_hand_in a LEFT JOIN m_material b ON a.mat_no=b.mat_no LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON a.modi_emp=c.uuid LEFT JOIN m_store d ON a.store_no=d.store_no LEFT JOIN sys_organization o ON o.id=a.team_no LEFT JOIN sys_audit_process ap ON ap.process_no=a.check_step WHERE LEFT(a.occ_date, 6) = #{monthQry} AND a.team_no IN
#{deptId}
AND a.store_no != '' AND a.data_src='交旧'
AND a.team_no=#{teamNoQry}
AND b.mat_code LIKE CONCAT('%', matCodeQry, '%')
AND b.mat_name LIKE CONCAT('%', matNameQry, '%')
ORDER BY a.occ_date DESC
